thread.title: Mass. brush fire burns underneath large power lines
thread.title_full: Mass. brush fire burns underneath large power lines

title: Mass. brush fire burns underneath large power lines
text: Brockton brush fire burns near Massachusetts power lines Brockton brush fire burns near Massachusetts power lines Advertisement Brockton brush fire burns near Massachusetts power lines A large brush fire was burning underneath several large power lines on the east side of Brockton, Massachusetts on Friday. Video from Sky 5 showed a swath of dry, brushy area burned underneath a path of power lines that passed near the Massasoit Community College campus. The brush fire appeared to be contained between Alger Street and Thatcher Street in the city of Brockton near the Whitman town line. Video from Sky 5 showed firefighters attempting to knock down the flames, with some vehicles getting stuck in thick mud in the area. There were no reports of injuries.
